name: Fruity Hunty Demo
description:
It is a game that tries to simulate the graphics and gameplay of the old handheld consoles with LCD screen meaning a simple but fun gameplay. 

The game consists of moving on a rope between two tree buildings collecting the fruits that have fallen to a friend above. By collecting the fruits we will learn some healthy tips about fruits.

This demo version consists of 4 different levels with their respective 4 tip bonus.

The music is based on the rhythms of the old casio keyboards models Pt-1 or 10 that were so famous in my childhood.

The game has an autosave function to store scores, game modes and unlocked bonus scenes.

In the demo version it is not possible to access the bonus game modes.

In the Gallery section you can take a walk through the museum to revisit the bonus tips you have already unlocked.

Fruity Hunty Demo has been created with gbstudio 3.

developed by _RubenRetro_

music created by _RubenRetro_

graphics created by _RubenRetro_.

special thanks to the whole gbstudio discord community and my friend Wave
